org.springframework.integration.dsl.jms

Class JmsOutboundChannelAdapterSpec<S extends JmsOutboundChannelAdapterSpec<S>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.integration.dsl.core.IntegrationComponentSpec<S,H>
      • org.springframework.integration.dsl.core.MessageHandlerSpec<S,org.springframework.integration.jms.JmsSendingMessageHandler>
        • org.springframework.integration.dsl.jms.JmsOutboundChannelAdapterSpec<S>
  • Type Parameters:
    S - the target JmsOutboundChannelAdapterSpec implementation type.

    org.springframework.beans.factory.FactoryBean<org.springframework.integration.jms.JmsSendingMessageHandler>

extends MessageHandlerSpec<S,org.springframework.integration.jms.JmsSendingMessageHandler>

    Artem Bilan

      • destination

        public <P> S destination(Function<org.springframework.messaging.Message<P>,?> destinationFunction)
        Configure a Function that will be invoked at run time to determine the destination to which a message will be sent. Typically used with a Java 8 Lambda expression: 
         .<Foo>destination(m -> m.getPayload().getState())
        Type Parameters:
        P - the expected payload type.
        Parameters:
        destinationFunction - the destination function.
        Returns:
        the current JmsOutboundChannelAdapterSpec.
        See Also:
        JmsSendingMessageHandler.setDestinationName(String), FunctionExpression
